title: Suggestion for Quick Casting
body:
Hi. We all know there are three ways to cast a spell in league: normal casting, quick casting, and clicking the spell. It is all about the preference. I personally like quick casting all my skills and I feel like I can never go back to just normal casting. 

But some skills are just not meant to be quick cast. Normal casting has an option to quick cast using Shift+(the skill). I was wondering if it could work the other way around. I think there should be a key to press to normal cast something that was set on quick cast.

What do you guys think?

replies.body: Go into hotkeys in settings and you can do that. Go down to quick cast and put in q,w,e,r, and then go to normal cast and do the Shift version of those.

> [{quoted}](name=Acidic Puddle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nfuyeFJU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-08T15:28:26.931+0000)
>
> Go into hotkeys in settings and you can do that. Go down to quick cast and put in q,w,e,r, and then go to normal cast and do the Shift version of those.

However, you have to do it manually for each key instead of just clicking Quick Cast all. At least i think.
There's an option that shows skill range with quick cast that allows you to "hold" a skill until you want to use it.
Quick cast Range Indicators. I do believe it's just a check box too.

well guys i'm not sure but i think it's called smart casting, at least it used to be. anyway, you're not supposed to smartcast every skill. like take ezreal for example. i have Q on normal for the added accuracy, W on smart cast because it's wider and easy to hit, E on smart cast because it's faster dodging, and R on normal because half of the time I hit R and sit there aiming until it's a good shot and release it.
As Thelmon says, Quick Cast Range Indicators. Spell on release of key, not start of key.
There's a way to set it up so that the spell casts upon LMB release, not press.  That's what I use.
That would be cool because i like to play rumble and Quick casting his ult just messes things up

Honestly? I think things that are extremely difficult to cast while on Quick Cast ({{champion:68}} ult) should be forced to use normal cast, just like some abilities are always quick cast ({{champion:69}} Q).
